document.full_text: north american moviegoers spent the memorial day weekend nursing a giant "hangover" as the raunchy comedy sequel helped power the holiday to record ticket sales, according to studio data issued on monday.
document.title: "hangover" and "pirates" sequels lead box office
lines_and_colors: north american moviegoers spent the memorial day weekend nursing a giant "hangover" as the raunchy comedy sequel helped power the holiday to record ticket sales, according to studio data issued on monday.
